nodes.text: Arky's Emporium of Forgotten Treasures was an antique store ran by Seb "Arky" Arkos. Located in the city of Xakrea, Arky's Emporium got caught up in the four-way agenda of Hal Horn, Ysanne Isard, Garm Bel Iblis and Moranda Savich around 0 BBY.
Among its stock were a Weequay chin-harp (sans Chord hammer) and a feline statue made of Ithorian toal wood. However, the shop was intended as a front for forged identification.
